reviewText:
DVD is good. We see the son of the originator doing the 3 basic forms. Not much more. Plays on my tele, but not on my computer (although I haven't tried any real tricks yet, so that may not be a total reality).

I would recommend it to all Uechi Ryu students.
Much needed..I'd recommend this product. Very well done... For those getting into Uechri Rye this is a must DVD...Learn from the Master himself.
